items.title: Apple to announce $100B further commitment for U.S. manufacturing
items.description: This is on top of Apple's previously announced plan to invest $500 billion into the U.S. over the next four years.

items.title: Tinder explores a redesign, dating ‘modes,’ and college-specific features to boost engagement
items.description: Tinder will redesign and debut college specific features, like searching for people within the college, to appeal to younger users.
